alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 7:49AM CDT until May 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Walhalla affecting Cavalier and Pembina Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pembina River at Walhalla. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM CDT Friday was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 9.1 feet Friday morning. Snowmelt and rain in southern Manitoba Canada has caused a new flood wave to move down the Pembina River impacting Walhalla. It appears that the river at Walhalla has crested earlier this morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
